content:
Those tips are really helpful, thanks! I think I'll focus on creating a balanced schedule and celebrating small wins to stay motivated. It can get overwhelming with volleyball games, triathlon training, and work, so I need to make sure I'm not overdoing it. And yeah, I'll definitely need to remind myself to have fun and not get too caught up in the intensity of it all.

Speaking of triathlon training, I was thinking about my swimming technique. I've been practicing my freestyle, but I'm not sure if I'm doing it efficiently. Do you have any tips on how to improve my freestyle technique?
```
